channel.title: Comments on: Swine Fever! – Rotation
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: By: Dead Badger
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: Yeah, Swayze is such a hack. I hear he prefers back bacon 'n all.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, Swayze is such a hack. I hear he prefers back bacon ‘n all.

item.title: By: Ceci
item.dc:creator: Ceci
item.description: That first bit was really disturbingly sensuous. Didn't care for the second half - too staged
item.content:encoded: That first bit was really disturbingly sensuous. Didn’t care for the second half – too staged

item.title: By: Candy
item.dc:creator: Candy
item.description: I am delighted to see that you have such a tender/creative household
item.content:encoded: I am delighted to see that you have such a tender/creative household

item.title: By: Dead Badger
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description:
Incidentally, if you look closely just before the cut, you can see Sam clench his fist in a gesture of masculine revulsion.
The things I make him do for art.
item.content:encoded:
Incidentally, if you look closely just before the cut, you can see Sam clench his fist in a gesture of masculine revulsion.

The things I make him do for art.
